channel.title: Reflection-PS ll Best Custom Server ll 500 Customs ll Custom NPC's ll Join Now!
channel.description:
Join Reflection-PS -500 + Customs -Custom NPC's -Active Communitiy -Friendly Staff Team -Daily Updates -Daily Events -Achievements -Prestige -Stable Economy -Dicing
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Updates 7/30/2015 Brutal Whips Hits Faster Now. Changed some stuff on yell now it shows ur NPC Kills > Your yell title. Added Some Commands , ::pricelist , ::npcguide , ::donateoffers , ::rules , ::protector (not easy!)
Now you can speak on clan chat without 250 npc kills Changed yell npc kills from 250 to 100
Added Lime Torva , Deflect Torva , Sap Torva http://prntscr.com/7zlpl7 http://prntscr.com/7zlpnu http://prntscr.com/7zlptq
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Updates 7/31/2015
Fixed Agility Bugs Added ::dls command for lime torva , deflect torva , sap torva Added New Customs http://prntscr.com/7z3xco http://prntscr.com/7z3xdy http://prntscr.com/7z3xg0
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Updates 8/1/2015
Fixed Dung Shop Fixed Spy Set Stats Fixed Striped Torva Stats Fixed Slayer Shop Crash Removed Spy Set From Prestige Shops Changed Home.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Youtube Videos : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bDp8uXuinI8 ( Old Home ) Youtube Video #2 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1eot5Zvqec ( Old Home ) Youtube Video #3 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGZl-DF2n3o ( Old Home ) Youtube Video #4 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8v4BWljBGGA ( New Customs Video )

Hope to see you ingame!
